reproduction.original_error_summary: Assertion failed in circt::arc::StateType::get() - state type must have a known bit width; got '!llhd.ref<i1>'
reproduction.reproduced_error_summary: No crash observed. Command executed successfully and produced valid LLVM IR output.
notes: The original crash used CIRCT version 1.139.0, which matches the current system version
The generated IR contains !llhd.ref<i1> which is mentioned in the original error
The arcilator pass completes successfully without assertion failure
This suggests the bug may have been fixed in a minor version update or depends on additional compilation flags
The test case source.sv contains an inout wire parameter (c) which corresponds to the llhd.ref type
